org.jclouds.vcloud.director.v1_5.features.admin
Interface GroupClient

public interface GroupClient

Provides synchronous access to Group objects.

Author:
danikov
See Also:
GroupAsyncClient

Method Summary

          Imports a group in an organization.

          Deletes a group.
 Group getGroup(URI groupUri)
          Retrieves a group.

          Modifies a group.
 

Method Detail

createGroup

                  Group group)
Imports a group in an organization.

Returns:
the created group

Returns:

                  Group group)
